show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #76 Katie Scarbrough "Creating Value"
subtitle: #76 Katie Scarbrough "Creating Value"
summary:
This week we are staying in Wyoming, we are heading just about a hundred miles west to visit with a friend of mine in the Wind River Mountains.
We talk about another Federal grazing situation, implementing joint monitoring programs and the challenges of raising a family in a remote location while juggling a bust multi state sell/buy trading empire.

Email Katie@barcross.com
